requirementsDescription: Complete the tasks below to claim your rewards. You can always go back and check the information if you’re not sure how.
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again.

requirements.RadQuestQuiz: Learn about RadQuest… and your guide, Jetty

Welcome.title: Welcome to RadQuest
Welcome.introDescription: Complete quests, learn about web3 and Radix, get some rewards!

JoinFriend.title: Join Your Friend
JoinFriend.introDescription: Once you’ve done the basic quests, accept your friend’s invitation and claim your reward

requirements.RadixQuiz: Learn about the Radix Network and dApps

WhatIsRadix.title: The Radix Network
WhatIsRadix.introDescription: The Radix Network: a breakthrough “layer-1” network for mainstream-ready web3.

requirements.ConnectWallet: Log in to RadQuest with your Radix Wallet
requirements.DownloadWallet: Download the Radix Wallet mobile app, create your first Account

SetupWallet.title: Get the Radix Wallet
SetupWallet.description: Your key to assets and dApps on Radix
SetupWallet.introDescription: Get the Radix Wallet to use with RadQuest or any other dApp built on Radix.

requirements.GetXRD: Get ready to do transactions on Radix

GetStuff.title: Get Some (Web3) Stuff!
GetStuff.introDescription: Do your first transactions to claim your first quest rewards right to your Radix Wallet.

card.title: Credit or debit card
card.description: Buy XRD simply and  securely online using Alchemy Pay.

exchange.title: Exchanges
exchange.description: Use one of many crypto exchanges that list XRD.

thorSwap.title: THORSwap
thorSwap.description: If you already have crypto in a wallet, THORSwap is a quick and easy bridge to buy XRD with BTC, ETH, or many more.

GetXrdMethodOptions.available: May be available in your country

CreatingRadMorphs.title: Creating RadMorphs
CreatingRadMorphs.introDescription: How to collect and combine on RadQuest to make the best and most rare RadMorph NFTs.

TransferTokens.title: Transfer Tokens
TransferTokens.description: Transfer stuff using the Radix Wallet
TransferTokens.introDescription: Use the Radix Wallet’s transfer feature to send assets to other people's Accounts.

NetworkStaking.title: Radix Network Staking
NetworkStaking.introDescription: Put your XRD to work helping secure the Radix Network – and earning you some yield

requirements.XrdStaked: Stake XRD using the Radix Dashboard

Thorswap.title: Bridge Tokens with Thorswap
Thorswap.description: Move assets in and out of Radix
Thorswap.introDescription: Use the THORSwap dApp to “bridge” assets into Radix and back out

requirements.MayaRouterWithdrawEvent: Do a swap into Radix on THORSwap of $50 value or more

QuestTogether.title: Invite Your Friends
QuestTogether.description: Invite your friends to give them XRD tokens and earn rewards!
QuestTogether.introDescription: You came to RadQuest following Matt’s link, join his party
QuestTogether.copyReferral: Copy your referral link and send it to your friends.
QuestTogether.referralsSoFarDescription: These friends have signed up using your link and completed the basic quests. You each get 5 XRD!
QuestTogether.info_1: Your friends will get a Simple Gift Box when they use your referral link and complete all the basic quests.
QuestTogether.info_2: You can also earn a reward for inviting your friends. View your status on the next screen.
QuestTogether.referMore: Refer {{count}} more friends to claim your rewards and progress to {{nextLevel}}!
QuestTogether.rewardsWaiting: You have rewards waiting for you! Don’t forget to claim!
QuestTogether.unlockedSuperLevelInfo: If you would like to apply for an invite-only referral program, please email hello@radixdlt.com
QuestTogether.SuperLevelInfo: Want to keep referring? Contact Radix to find out about our influencer reward scheme!
QuestTogether.SuperLevelButton: Want to keep referring? Contact Radix to find out about our influencer reward scheme!

requirements.JettySwap: Do a swap on Jetty DEX
requirements.LettySwap: Do a swap on Letty DEX

DEXSwaps.title: Swap Tokens on a DEX
DEXSwaps.introDescription: Learn how to safely swap tokens on Radix using a decentralized exchange (DEX)

requirements.LearnDapps: Learn where you can find new Radix dApps

ExploreEcosystem.title: Explore the Radix Ecosystem
ExploreEcosystem.description: Experience a world of new dApps
ExploreEcosystem.introDescription: Start using all of the amazing dApps already in the Radix ecosystem
